airhockeyjava.physical

Class FrictionGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • airhockeyjava.physical.FrictionGrid

  • public class FrictionGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing dynamic friction zones of the table. Right now the friction model works by overlaying a grid on the table, with each grid cell mapping to a specific friction coefficient value. The values may either be explicitly set or implicitly determined from physical item collisions and subsequent responses.
    Author:
    Joshua Segeren
